doc:
Erkan Mustafa https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erkan_Mustafa 0 Erkan Mustafa (born 14 May 1970) is a British actor and television presenter of Turkish Cypriot descent, most noted for the part of Roland Browning in Grange Hill (BBC 1982–1987). Other parts include "Enormous Orphan" in Blackadder's Christmas Carol (1988) and "Otto" in Chef! (1991). In 1993 Channel 4's The Word tracked him down to a friend's record shop where he was helping out. He appeared on This Morning's Grange Hill reunion in 1998. In 2005 he appeared in the reunion programme Bring Back Grange Hill. Mustafa occasionally works in television with fellow Grange Hill star Lee MacDonald and both were seen presenting in recent times on E4 Music. In October 2009, Mustafa hosted a Grange Hill cast reunion at Sound nightclub in London's Leicester Square. Erkan has just worked on a short film called The All-Nighter, written directed by Lee Phillips, co-stars Ronald Forfar Martin Hancock. It will be screened at international film festivals during 2018. Erkan_Mustafa ( born 14_May_1970 ) is a_British_actor_and_television_presenter of Turkish_Cypriot_descent , most noted for the_part of Roland_Browning in Grange_Hill ( BBC_1982 – 1987 ) . Other_parts include " Enormous_Orphan " in Blackadder 's_Christmas_Carol_(_1988_)_and_"_Otto " in Chef ! (_1991_) . In 1993_Channel_4 's The_Word tracked him down to a_friend 's_record_shop where he was_helping out . He appeared on This_Morning 's_Grange_Hill_reunion in 1998 . In 2005 he appeared in the_reunion_programme Bring Back Grange_Hill . Mustafa occasionally works in television with fellow_Grange_Hill_star_Lee_MacDonald and both were_seen_presenting in recent_times on E4_Music . In October_2009 , Mustafa hosted a_Grange_Hill cast reunion at Sound_nightclub in London 's_Leicester_Square . Erkan has_just_worked on a_short_film called The_All-Nighter , written_ by Lee_Phillips , co-stars_Ronald_Forfar_ . It will_be_screened at international_film_festivals during 2018 .
